definition: step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]
early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
to fall behind/to lag (in technology etc)/backward/to retrogress
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病變會“漂白了”，成爲清潔傷口癒合後，將蛻皮。

sentences.english: Some desires are formed as the result of rational thought pro-  cesses.
sentences.chinese: 有些慾望在理性的思考後產生。

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在後階段，她們還配備了連發槍以及軍棍和軍刀。

sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 這位班長自打高中畢業後就入伍了。

sentences.english: When her statement was read a very cleat light was cast upon the situation.
sentences.chinese: 她的聲明宣讀後，情況便顯得非常清楚了。

sentences.english: What sequela is there after becoming gall-stone operation?
sentences.chinese: 做了膽結石手術後有什麼後遺症嗎？

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: Horses should be walked for a while after a race.
sentences.chinese: 比賽後，應讓馬慢走一會兒。

sentences.english: Wash grapes overnight after don't hire small fly.
sentences.chinese: 洗葡萄隔夜後不招小飛蟲。

sentences.english: At the end of the term, you typically get no cash back.
sentences.chinese: 固定年限到期後，你一般不會得到任何現金返還。

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數患者手術後恢復良好，僅1例死於尿崩症。

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表後，點擊確定並關閉本地組策略編輯器。

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片顯示面積活躍在即席講話只是後，毗鄰的腫瘤。

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美國的奴隸制度自南北戰爭後就廢除了。

sentences.english: He got a whole sackful of letters from listeners following the show.
sentences.chinese: 演出後他收到大量的聽衆來信。

sentences.english: After the Russo-Japanese War, Japan's occupation of southern Sakhalin in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 日俄戰爭後，日本佔領俄國庫頁島南部。

definition: in a little while/in a moment/later on
early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
as for/as to/to go so far as to
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
